articles.title: Clashes over fossil fuels, Gaza war at COP28 climate summit - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Israel’s assault on Gaza resumes the day after the summit reaches an agreement over a long-sought rehabilitation fund.
articles.content:
UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres has urged world leaders at the COP28 climate summit to plan for a future without fossil fuels, saying there was no other way to curb global warming.
